it.simonedegiacomi.goboxapi.myws

Class MyWSClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.simonedegiacomi.goboxapi.myws.MyWSClient

  • public class MyWSClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an implementation of handlers socket based onEvent the library 'TooTallNate/Java-WebSocket'. This class add some feature like event handling and query concept. Created on 28/12/15.

        public void onEvent(java.lang.String event,

      • addEventHandler

        public void addEventHandler(WSEventListener handler)
        Register an event handler, like 'onEvent', but you don't need to specify the event name. To make this work you need to put the WSEvent notation before the 'onEvent' method.
        Parameters:
        handler - Handler to register.

      • onQuery

        public void onQuery(java.lang.String queryName,
                    WSQueryHandler listener)
        This method allows you to register an method that answer a response
        Parameters:
        queryName - Name of the query that the method will answer
        listener - Listener that will call to answer the query

        responseListener - Listener that will call when the response of the query is retrieve.
